member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.CustomTableFactory.GetCustomTable(Mockup2.QueryBuilder)
member.summary: Retrieves the stored query from the QueryBuilder and executes it against the database provided by the dbCon. The results are stored as a list of dictionary objects keyed to a Column. The value is an object. Each dictionary represents a row in table.
member.param: The QueryBuilder object containing the SQL query to invoke against the database.
member.returns: A CustomTable that has the resulting 'table' as a list of Dictionary<Column, object>

member.name: M:Mockup2.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:Mockup2.QueryBuilder
M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.AddQuery(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the supplied query to pastQueries dictionary, incrementing the number of times it has been created if it already exists.
member.param: The query to add.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Update(Mockup2.Tables.Table)
member.summary: Adds an Update statement to the current SQL query. Only supports updating one table at present. This can be easily changed later, if need be. This method MUST be paired with a Where method, else QueryBuilder will throw an exception. See the class description for more details.
member.param: The Table to be updated.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Insert(Mockup2.Tables.Table)
member.summary: Adds an Insert statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: The Table to be inserted into.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Values(System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds a Values statement to the current SQL query. There are two ways to perform an insert in SQL - the first is to specify both column name and value, which allows you to leave some values out and have them default. The second is to not specify column names, but instead specify all values in the correct order. This method uses the latter, so ensure you supply ALL values for the given Table, and that they are the correct data type.
member.param: The objects that will be used as values to insert into Table.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Set(System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds a Set statement to the current SQL query. A word of warning for the parameters: to satisfy SQL, they must be pairs of Column and value. However, there is no way to enforce this and still have the amount supplied be variable (without creating a Tuple, or something similar), so please ensure you supply a Column and a value.
member.param: Objects that correspond to pairs of Columns and values to be inserted into said Column.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.GetSelectedColumns
member.summary: Returns the list of Columns that have been used in a Select method.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Select(Mockup2.Tables.Column[])
member.summary: Adds a Select statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: The Columns to be selected from the Tables.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.TrimQuery(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convenience method to quickly trim the query string down by a specified amount of characters. Used to remove trailing characters such as commas from the ends of statements.
member.param: The amount of characters to trim from the end of the string.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.From(Mockup2.Tables.Table[])
member.summary: Adds a From statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: The tables to be used in the From statement.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Where(Mockup2.QueryBuilder.WhereClass[])
member.summary: Adds a Where statement to the current SQL query. This method takes a list of WhereClass instances as it's parameter.
member.param: The WhereClass instances to add to this query.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.And
member.summary: A WhereClass for an SQL And statement. To be used in conjunction with a Where method.
member.returns: A WhereClass representing the SQL And statement.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.Or
member.summary: A WhereClass for an SQL Or statement. To be used in conjunction with a Where method.
member.returns: A WhereClass representing the SQL Or statement.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.IsEqual(Mockup2.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A WhereClass for an SQL equals check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a Column and an object.
member.param: The Column to be checked.
The object to be checked.
member.returns: A WhereClass that represents the equality check in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.IsLessThan(Mockup2.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A WhereClass for an SQL less than check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a Column and an object.
member.param: The Column to be checked.
The object to be checked.
member.returns: A WhereClass that represents the less than statement in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.ToString
member.summary: Adds a semicolon to the finished query, and adds the query to the running list of queries performed. Checks to see if an Update statement is present without a Where statement, and throws an exception if so.

member.name: M:Mockup2.QueryBuilder.DumpLog
member.summary: Dumps the stored queries that have been requested over the program lifetime, and how many times they have been requested. Outputs this information to standard output.
